doc.title: Franziska
doc.plot: Franziska is a hand-made blow-up - single Super 8 frames are fixed into windows cut in 16mm black and white film... The flickering, emphasized by alternating picture/no picture, brutally chops apart the flowing continuity of the original take, but has the simultaneous effect of gently stretching the time component of human movement in the picture. (Thomas Korschil)
